code.value:
from typing import List

import pandas as pd

from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import (BaseLanguageModel, Document, Prompt,
                                   PromptTemplate)


class Component(CustomComponent):
    documentation: str = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"

    def build_config(self):
        return {}

    async def build(self, docs: List[Document],llm: BaseLanguageModel, prompt: Prompt) -> list[Document]:
        prompt_template = PromptTemplate.from_template(prompt)
        chain = prompt_template | llm
        # Now we will turn the docs into a list of strings
        page_contents = [{"commits":doc.page_content} for doc in docs]
        # Now we will run the chain using the batch method
        results = await chain.abatch(page_contents)
        # Each result has content
        # So we will create a new document for each result
        result_docs = [Document(page_content=result.content) for result in results]
        rows = [{"result": result.content, "page_content":doc} for result,doc in zip(results, page_contents)]
        df = pd.DataFrame(rows)
        df.to_pickle("commits.pkl")
        return result_docs
code.name: code

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.value:
You'll receive part of the output of a `git log --since='2 months ago' --pretty=format:'%an, %ar : %s' --no-merges > log.txt` of Langflow. What you need to do is create a bullet point list of the most important commits (feature defining or important bugfixes). 
This will be used to construct a summarized PR description later on.

The main features of this PR/Release are:
- Langflow Store integration and release. Now you can share and use shared components
- Grouped components. Now you can create many components and group them, turning them into one.
- Any other feature you encounter.

Formatting rules: do not write anything but the bullet points. Be concise. Write a sentence for each main point. No commit title should be copied.
You should mention the names that contributed the most at the end as a bullet point. Exclude these:  Gabriel Luiz Freitas Almeida, Lucas Oliveira, cristhianzl, anovazzi1
Part of commit list:
{commits}

from typing import List

import pandas as pd

from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import (BaseLanguageModel, Document, Prompt,
                                   PromptTemplate)


class Component(CustomComponent):
    documentation: str = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"

    def build_config(self):
        return {}

    async def build(self, docs: List[Document],llm: BaseLanguageModel, prompt: Prompt) -> list[Document]:
        prompt_template = PromptTemplate.from_template(prompt)
        chain = prompt_template | llm
        # Now we will turn the docs into a list of strings
        page_contents = [{"commits":doc.page_content} for doc in docs]
        # Now we will run the chain using the batch method
        results = await chain.abatch(page_contents)
        # Each result has content
        # So we will create a new document for each result
        result_docs = [Document(page_content=result.content) for result in results]
        rows = [{"result": result.content, "page_content":doc} for result,doc in zip(results, page_contents)]
        df = pd.DataFrame(rows)
        df.to_pickle("commits.pkl")
        return result_docs
